fields.feature_details: Control everything, both your infrastructure and your applictaions from a single dashboard.
Manage logs, billing data and VPN connections out of the box.
Connect 3rd party applications or add new applications with custom panels.
We provide preconfigured apps for core features such as active directory, filesharing, backup, etc.
Access all of the functions through APIs. Integrate external applications or workflows.
24x7 support, through our knowledgebase and ticketing system https://support.va.mk
